resources.string:
Wait for few seconds please and RemoteController connected computer automatically.

 If you still see this message after a few seconds passed than you need to make a simple set up on your computer:

 1. Install and start RemoteControllerServer application

 2. For wireless control of your computer, connect this device and computer to the same Wi-Fi network 

 3. Restart RemoteController and wait until it connects your computer automatically
